recipes.startdescription: 我的空洞之心需要获得新的体验……
recipes.label: 撕裂的心痛

recipes.startdescription: Colors begins to drain, as my Lack-Heart begins to gnaw at my insides.
recipes.label: Splinters of Sorrow

recipes.startdescription: my veneer of functionality is cracking, revealing I am just a shell of a person housing a deep, dark pit in my chest.
recipes.label: Cracks in Conviction

recipes.description: I appease my Lack-Heart with my recent happy memories, reconstructing the self that slowly drained within.
recipes.label: Stemming the Flood
Hollowed Like an Empty Shell
recipes.description: All of my joy, charm and desires have drained into the pitt that was once my heart. I am not gone, but I do not intend to travel much farther either. I will settle here, eaking out a shallow, grey existance on this shallow, grey sea.
recipes.startdescription: The world is muting to browns and greys as sounds muffle into noise. [The Heart-ache token will lead to a game over now, unless you supply it with a thrill.]
I have patched up my sorrow, and once again have found the path towards the light
recipes.label: A Homecoming of Colour.
